Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Houston in 1985...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Mario Soto (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1986, off Steve Busby (PIT)...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 7 runs on 4/18/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1986, hitting .458 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 6/20/1987...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 4/28/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1988, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York (N) on 5/22/1988...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/25/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1990, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against San Francisco on 7/1/1991...
Hit for the cycle against Chicago (N) on 7/16/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1992, hitting .448 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1992...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against San Francisco on 7/9/1995...
